entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: SSW 38 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early this evening. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
